s1.title: How to get listed
s1.p: If you do not find your book here, make sure you tell us. Enter the title after the words "Link: Article:" in the subject, and provide the title and publications of your article. Do not forget to tell us the URL if possible. You could also follow the Contributing page to make it easier for everyone.
